flash.tools.debugger.concrete

Class ProcessListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • flash.tools.debugger.concrete.ProcessListener

  • public class ProcessListener
extends Object
    Listens to several things about a process: captures its stdout/stderr messages, detects when the process exits, and captures its exit code.

    When a process exits, the ProcessListener can send out a notification. If you want that to happen, call startLaunchNotifier().

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProcessListener(String[] launchCommand, Process process, ILaunchNotification launchNotification, boolean forDebugging, boolean isAIRapp)
      Starts listening to stdout and stderr of the launched process.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IOException createLaunchFailureException()
      Creates an exception indicating that the process terminated with some sort of error.
      String[] getLaunchCommand()
      Returns the command args that were used to launch the process.
      int getProcessExitValue() 
      String getProcessMessages()
      Returns all messages that were sent to stdout and stderr by the process, combined into one string.
      boolean isAIRApp() 
      boolean isProcessDead() 
      void setIsRunLaunch(boolean forRunLaunching) 
      void startLaunchNotifier()
      Creates a background thread that will call the launch notifier when the process terminates.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ProcessListener

        public ProcessListener(String[] launchCommand,
               Process process,
               ILaunchNotification launchNotification,
               boolean forDebugging,
               boolean isAIRapp)
        Starts listening to stdout and stderr of the launched process. The caller can later call getProcessMessages() to capture that output.

    • Method Detail

      • startLaunchNotifier

        public void startLaunchNotifier()
        Creates a background thread that will call the launch notifier when the process terminates.

        Returns the command args that were used to launch the process.

                        throws IllegalThreadStateException
        Throws:
        IllegalThreadStateException

      • getProcessMessages

        public String getProcessMessages()
        Returns all messages that were sent to stdout and stderr by the process, combined into one string.

      • createLaunchFailureException

        public IOException createLaunchFailureException()
        Creates an exception indicating that the process terminated with some sort of error. The returned exception may be an AlreadyActiveApplicationException or a CommandLineException.

      • setIsRunLaunch

        public void setIsRunLaunch(boolean forRunLaunching)
